MailTemp.Subject: Your's registered Workshop/Event has been modified
MailTemp.Body:
Hello $Name$,
Your's Registered Workshop / Event has been modified due to following reasons.
Reason : $ChangeReason$
Brief details are below
Workshop Name : $WorkShopName$
Workshop Center : $CenterName$
Event Date : $EventDate$
Event Time : $EventTime$
Please, Confirm your participation on registered Workshop/Event,by logging in to your account.Click here to Login
If you have any questions or need support, email us at support@gefingerprints.com
Thank You,
GE Fingerprints Team
